website_summaries.verdict: A comprehensive study guide that is designed to alleviate much of the stress associated with taking the PMP exam.
pros: Author Belinda Goodrich has compiled an expansive guide that provides the reader with  tips, exercises, practice tests, and more
The book is crisply written and delivers information in a logical manner that makes the material easy to digest and comprehend
cons: You will need to sign up for an account with the company in order to get all the benefits that the book has to offer

customer_reviews.title: Successfully passed exam first attempt
customer_reviews.text: Belinda’s Program for Exam Success is the real deal! Each chapter in the guide includes a combination of vocabulary exercises and practice questions for immediate feedback on content retention and where you may need to spend more time studying. Belinda’s also included helpful test tips throughout the entire guide that were very relevant with my exam experience. If you do all the study guide exercises and follow the guidance provided on target practice test scores you’ll know when your ready to take the exam! Note: This guide also covers what to expect during the application, audit process and on exam day. I did get audited but was prepared based on guidance provided.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Macblane

customer_reviews.title: Great Study Guide
customer_reviews.text: Belinda's Hints are very helpful through the book and in most chapters. Belinda provides examples too, which is very helpful. At end of each chapter their are tests and vocabulary matching exercise, longer tests at end of study guide. More free tests available in front of book, after you go to link. (You will need to sign up for an account on PM Learning Website though. You will need Amazon shipping/tracking # to activate, so keep that number handy, otherwise you have to contact customer service in book). Belinda's company also provides boot camp and cram review as well. Over all, I think this is a great study tool.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Great PMP Prep  book
customer_reviews.text: This is a great book to have for test prep and project management reference. It is very helpful to have examples of charts, breakdown structures, and real life examples of how the tools are used. Also when explaining terms like Grade vs precision. Belinda’s tips are also great. Overall very helpful addition to exam prep. Very good deal at $25. Thanks Belinda.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well organized!
customer_reviews.text: This book is excellent. The information is organized in an easy to understand format, with many graphics to help those who learn things visually. The end of the chapter review asks the right questions to see how well you retained the information. The time limit on each chapter test help prepare you for the actual PMP test, and help you to understand areas that might need further review. Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Patti P.

customer_reviews.title: This is the book you want to pass the PMP exam.
customer_reviews.text: Great approach to the PMP exam. Very thorough, very organized in such a way that helps you remember. Lots of great pointers and memory tricks. This guide will help you pass the first time for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Monty Cole

customer_reviews.title: It makes Project Management easier to understand
customer_reviews.text: I am in preparation of the exam, and chose this book due to the reviews. Got to support it as its not boring and makes Project management easier to understand and apply. Especially if you are new and working in the field, its a good guide helping you in this aspect and wanting to improve. Haven't done the exam as yet, however I am sure with regular practice, preparation and using this guide I will pass. Wish me luck.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia-Ann

customer_reviews.title: A PMP Prep Winner
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! A comprehensive yet content rich guide for learning and understanding what you need to know for the PMP exam. Highly recommend this readable volume. It’s going to be a well used tool in my PM toolbox.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie W

customer_reviews.title: Amazing PM study tool!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing study guide product!!! Easy to review data and test yourself as you learn.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Better than the PMBOK!
customer_reviews.text: I had the opportunity to use this book during a1 week intensive program with Belinda and it was great. She adds additional value in person but I think just studying and doing all the practice tests in this book would have gotten me to pass the PMP, with Belinda I passed with distinction! If it's not included, also get her quick study guide, it has a great recommended dump sheet that definitely helped me. I just passed the PMP on October 2018, super applicable to version 6 of the PMBOK.
customer_reviews.author: Em Ru

customer_reviews.title: This is outdated
customer_reviews.text: The post office changed their test in 2019, however this was published in 2018, so it's obsolete.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: This book was extremely helpful
customer_reviews.text: The writing is simple which makes for easy assimilation and smooth recollection. Most of the tips were easy for me to relate with. I prepared for my PMP exam with the PMBOK guide, this book, Rita's Flashcards and I passed the exam on my first attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer
